name: NCT03421379_secondaryOutcomeMeasure_0_OG001
title: Pharmacodynamics (PD): Change From Baseline in Maximal Blood Glucose (BGmax) of Glucagon Nasal Powder and Glucagon Hydrochloride Intramuscular (IM) at Pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 90, 120, 240 minutes after each glucagon administration for Glucagon Hydrochloride Solution in NCT03421379

note.text: Outcome Measure Population Description: All randomized patients who receive at least 1 dose of the study drug and have evaluable PD data.

observed.display: A single dose of 1 mg glucagon hydrochloride solution was administered IM
